application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: t 24 Cherry reduce top by 1-2 meters selective formative prune crown clean .t 17 cherry formative prunet 11 lime reduce back to most recent reduction points leaving suitable growth points thin inner canopy 50% remove main trunk suckerst 28  Tree of heaven reduce canopy by 20% to help chestnut retain the natural flow of canopy.t 45 Liquidamber lift lower canopy over sign and road 4 meters from ground small diameter branchest35 bay tree trim back to previous pointst35 a variegated holly same as 35t44 bay same as t35All London plane tree to check for massaria & remove dead and weak branches..t 5 6 & 8 Birch crown clean formative prune light ..t2 amalananchia prune back from lightt 3 oak lift to 3 meters small diameter branches only on going maintenance
